title: Family Fun and Fireworks Await at Sandy Springs' Stars & Stripes Celebration
content: Get ready for a star-spangled evening of fun as the City of Sandy Springs hosts its annual Stars & Stripes Fireworks Celebration on Friday, July 4 at City Springs. andySpringsInstagram: @CityofS Now in its 12th year, the Stars & Stripes Celebration has become a beloved tradition, filling the heart of Sandy Springs with music, community spirit, and patriotic sparkle.
